name: Hungarian Grain and Feed Association
membership: We are member of COCERAL and FEFAC.
goal: The main task of our Association is the lobby activity both on the national and international levels. We help our members reach a common professional opinion, we also offer professional representation and protection of their interests. The Association supplies the members with updated information keeping contact with the members regularly. Our main task is to ensure market transparency and free trade.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Customs, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives: ILUC, GMO, Renewable Energy Directive II, TTIP, EU-Ukraine DCFTA, bilateral trade agreements
